name: Simulator X-Ray Body
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true X-rays of Body.
Simulator X-Ray Body
Simulator X-ray body - this game is a joke app, where you can do an x-ray of the body without causing harm to themselves or to anyone! CAUTION This is not a real scanner, but only the emulator, the game The game is intended for entertainment and prank your friends and family!
Want to see that people in the picture x-ray? This is a very fun and interesting! Joke on your friends, on pets or laugh at you! It's easy to believe it!
To use it, point to your bag or a friend or loved ones, and then scan the result of surprise! The app does not any radiation and is completely safe for your health! The result is given random!
Attention! This is not a real X-ray, it is designed to joke and play!
Thanks for playing with us, leave us your comments and suggestions, we will try to make the game even more interesting for you!
